posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: How to use Git & Github
posts.text: GitInstall Git아래 링크로 접속 https://git-scm.com/ 설치 버튼 클릭 다 next 하시고 설치 완료 하시면 됩니다. 환경 변수 설정내pc > 오른쪽마우스 > 속성 > 고급시스템 설정 > 환경 변수 > 시스템 변수에서 Path 선택 후 편집 아래 경로 추가 12C:\Program Files\Git\cmdC:\Program Files\Git\bin Run server1$ git init

posts.title: Web Scraping with Python
posts.text: Source Code1234567891011121314151617181920212223import requestsfrom bs4 import BeautifulSoupprint("[IT 관련 뉴스]") url = "https://news.naver.com"headers = {"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/90.0.4430.212 Safari/537.36"} res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)res.raise_for_status()soup = BeautifulSoup(res.text, "lxml")news_list = soup.find("ul", attrs={"class":"mlist2 no_bg"}).find_all("li", limit=3)for index, news in enumerate(news_list): a_idx = 0 img = news.find("img") if img: a_idx = 1 title = news.find_all("a")[a_idx].get_text().strip() link = news.find_all("a")[a_idx]["href"] print("{0}." "{1}".format(index+1, title)) print("링크 : {0}".format(link))

posts.title: Numpy
posts.text: What is Numpy? 행렬 곱셈 수치 계산 What different List and NumpyList1배열과 배열을 더하면 하나의 배열로 합쳐진다. Numpy1배열과 배열을 더하면 각 배열 값들의 합으로 구성된다. What is Reshape12곱의 값이 같아야함.-1 : 자동으로 배열값을 찾아준다. Numpy example12345678910111213141516import numpy as np## An exampleprint("######################################")print("An example")a = np.arange(15).reshape(3,5)print("a:",a)print("a.shape :",a.shape)print("a.ndim :",a.ndim)print("a.dtype.name :",a.dtype.name)print("a.itemsize :",a.itemsize)print("a.size : ",a.size)type(a)b = np.array([6, 7, 8])print(b)type(b) 12345678910print("######################################")## Array Creationprint("Array Creation")ar = np.array([2, 3, 4])print("ar : ",ar)print("ar.dtype : ",ar.dtype)br = np.array([1.2, 3.5, 5.1])print("br : ",br)print("br.dtype : ",br.dtype) 1234567891011121314print("######################################")## Printing Arraysprint("Printing Arrays")### 1d arraya1 = np.arange(6)print(a1)print()### 2d arrayb1 = np.arange(12).reshape(4,3)print(b1)print()### 3d arrayc1 = np.arange(24).reshape(2, 3, 4)print(c1) 12345678910111213print("######################################")##Basic Operationsprint("Basic Operations")a = np.array([20, 30, 40, 50])b = np.arange(4)print(b)c = a - bprint(c)print(b**2)print(10*np.sin(a))print(a<35)

posts.title: Pandas
posts.text: What is Pandas? 데이터 전처리 모듈 Why we should use Pandas? garbage data -> garbage result Pandas example12345import numpy as npprint("numpy version : ",np.__version__)import pandas as pdprint("pandas version : ",pd.__version__) 123## 개체 생성s = pd.Series([1, 3, 5, np.nan, 6, 8])print(s) 1234## 날짜 시간 numpy 배열 -> DataFrame 만들기dates = pd.date_range("20210623", periods=6)print(dates)print() 123df = pd.DataFrame(np.random.randn(6,4), index=dates, columns=list("ABCD"))print(df)print() 1234567891011121314## Series -> DataFramedf2 = pd.DataFrame( { "A": 1.0, "B": pd.Timestamp("20210623"), "C":pd.Series(1, index=list(range(4)), dtype="float32"), "D": np.array([3] * 4, dtype="int32"), "E":pd.Categorical(["test", "train", "test", "train"]), "F": "foo", } )print(df2,"\n")print(df2.dtypes) 1234## 데이터 보기print(df.head())print(df.tail(3))print() 1234## index, columnsprint(df.index)print(df.columns)print() 123## 데이터 통계 요약print(df.describe())print()

posts.title: 210624 가상화
posts.text: Kaggle 자료 활용 먼저 버전 체크를 하자! Pycaret 설치 명령프롬프트를 관리자로 실행 바탕화면에 pycaret 폴더 생성 명령프롬프트에서 cd로 해당 폴더로 이동 -> cd C:\Users\1\Desktop\pycaret 가상 환경 만들기$conda create –name pycaret(이름설정) python=3.8 가상환경 접속$conda activate pycaret pycaret 설치$ pip install pycaret 설치 오류가 발생 아래 링크로 접속 “https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/visual-cpp-build-tools/ C++ 설치 후 재설치 설치 완료 후 확인anaconda Channels 를 pycaret으로 변경 JupyterLab or Jupyter Notebook 실행 후 아래 예제 실행해보기 123from pycaret.datasets import get_datadataset = get_data('credit')dataset.shape 실행결과

posts.title: Numpy_2
posts.text:
Numpy exampleBasic Operations 212345A = np.array([[1, 1], [0, 1]])B = np.array([[2, 0], [3, 4]])print(" A*B
",A * B) result A*B [[2 0] [0 4]] A@B [[5 4] [3 4]] A.dat(B) [[5 4] [3 4]] 1234567rg = np.random.default_rng(1)a = np.ones((2, 3), dtype=int)b = rg.random((2, 3))a *= 3print("a
",a)b += aprint("b
",b) resulta [[3 3 3] [3 3 3]]b [[3.51182162 3.9504637 3.14415961] [3.94864945 3.31183145 3.42332645]]

posts.title: Plotly
posts.text: Make Grape with Plotly1234567import plotly.express as pximport chart_studiogapminder = px.data.gapminder()fig = px.scatter(gapminder.query("year==2007"), x="gdpPercap", y="lifeExp", size="pop", color="continent", hover_name="country", log_x=True, size_max=60)fig.show()
